content:
The drone of the 45th Artillery Brigade was destroyed by the Russian station R-330G "resident".

This was reported by the Ministry of Defense on the social network X.

Air Intelligence 45 Oabr discovered an automated obstacle station P-330G "resident".

An FPV drone of the 45th Artillery Brigade destroyed a “no-analogue” russian R-330Zh Zhitel EW jamming communication station.
Now the station has joined the russian scrap metal army.pic.twitter.com/3vgcqiGbHZ

— Defense of Ukraine (@DefenceU)March 27, 2024


After that, the enemy station was destroyed from the drone. "Now the station has replenished the Russian army of scrap," added to the Ministry of Defense.

Earlier the Armyinform reported that the resident station wasdestroyedIn the Zaporizhzhya region by the Himars blow.
title: Drone Accident: The Russian army of scrap was replenished
description: This was reported by the Ministry of Defense on the social network H. Aero -intelligence 45 Oabr found ...
author: Army Inform
